description:
CREATIVE PORTRAIT RETOUCHING – ACHIEVE THE MOST DESIRED LOOK

  • MORE THAN 4770 STUDENTS HAVE ENROLLED ALREADY
  • 50+ Min PHOTOSHOP LESSONS " Making Photoshop Fun & Easy "
  • 30+ 5 Star Reviews from really happy & satisfied students
  • No Prior Photoshop knowledge needed "Guaranteed"
  • Full & free lifetime access to the complete course
  • All future & additional lectures will always be free of charge
  • No illustrator, plugins or other software is needed "You only need Photoshop"

STOP WASTING YOUR TIME AND LEARN THESE QUICK TIPS TODAY?

  • AND DO IT EASILY AND INSTANTLY?
  • AND WITH ALL PHOTOSHOP STEPS REVEALED?
  • AND WITH NO PRIOR PHOTOSHOP KNOWLEDGE!
  • AND TAKE YOUR IMAGE FORM BLAA TO WOW!

--------------------------- ” Then this course is for you ” -------------------------------

What This Course Entails:

I will teach you how to get into Photoshop, so don’t worry if you don’t have prior experience with Photoshop or other Plugins. Follow my lead and I’ll teach you to be good at it! “Seriously”

All my Photoshop instructions form part of a comprehensive guide that can help you to accomplish your goals by applying these skills. During the lesson you get to eavesdrop as I work, giving you some insight as to how I work and what I do.

The idea is to make photoshop retouching fun and simple! "Anyone can do this"

Whether you have previous experience with Photoshop or not, it doesn't matter. Apply your knowledge for half an hour a day and you could be making huge improvements or even extra cash, just like me.

"And I'm not kidding when I say that you need nothing but Photoshop!"

All future extra lectures and upgrades are always included for free. Unconditional Udemy 30 day money-back guarantee - that's my personal promise of your success!

You'll learn

  1. How to work with advanced Photoshop / retouching tools
  2. How to create amazing color grades
  3. How to work with Photoshop Plugins " The best once out there"
  4. How to work with the best dodge & burn techniques
  5. How to work with advanced technique on adjustment layers
  6. How to create amazing light effects
  7. How to work & create light flares "The best out there"

... and much, much more!

Intrigued yet? Then keep reading!

As with all my courses: the initial low price will increase shortly. This one is currently $60 and it will soon upgrade to $90 so join in now! "You will have unlimited lifetime access at no extra cost" Not just that; all future additional lectures, bonuses, etc in this course are always free.

There's an unconditional, no-questions-asked full 30-day money-back guarantee! I'm known for always offering support in Udemy, so feel free to shout out if you're stuck or need assistance. "I'm here to help"

One final note:

My goal is to teach you Photoshop, so don't stress about not having worked in Photoshop before. "I do my best to make it simple & fun"

I've crammed all my portrait knowledge into +50 Min Photoshop tutorials!

After going through this course you'll be able to apply your new skills to Photoshop any portrait and make some extra cash along the way.

All you have to do is click on the "take this course" button on the top right corner. You have nothing to lose. In fact, you've got a lot to gain!

Thank you, Manni
title: Creative Portrait Retouching - Achieve The Most Desired Look
